# STA 199 - Section 1 {#sta199-1 .unnumbered}

**Introduction to Data Science and Statistical Thinking (STA 199-001)**

In Spring 2022, this section of STA 199 is taught by [Prof. Jacob Smith](https://scholars.duke.edu/person/jacob.f.smith).

The TAs for the course are Alison Reynolds, Olivier Binette, Heather Mathews, Larry Chen, Mariana Izon, Miller Jacob, Amber Potter, Jasmine Wen, and Jerry (Mutian) Xin.

Go to the [**STA 199 - Section 1 course website**]() for course specific information.
